Hello World

Hello and thanks for checking out Blogginekyll! It's a super simple theme for a Jekyll blog thats quick and easy to customise. Check out the Readme to get started!

A little about me

Yo, I'm Brad and I'm a developer making awesome stuff for Mint Digital in London. I'm currently working on a job board for graduates and to totally revolutionise local sport. Who wants to touch me… I said who wants to fucking touch me! Ooooh
